title: How to Have a Video Game Party

steps.headline: Plan two weeks ahead and make it on a weekend.
Call all your friends and ask them.
steps.description:
:
Can you make it on (date of party)? How many controllers can you bring for (insert console name)? Can you bring any snacks (optional)?

steps.headline: Pick one console.
steps.description: And rent games from Gamefly or other places like that (you can buy games, too, if you want).

steps.headline: Set the console up in a big room with lots of furniture and tables.
Get snacks and soda for the party and clean all the dishes.
steps.description: You never know how many dishes you'll use.

steps.headline: Set up the party.
steps.description: Put the snacks on the tables, pour one cup of soda for every friend, plug up the controllers and pick out the games for the night.

steps.headline: Have fun.
steps.description: Don't freak out after losing a game, or be cocky. By doing that, you ruin the party.

text:
Plan two weeks ahead and make it on a weekend.  Call all your friends and ask them. :
Can you make it on (date of party)? How many controllers can you bring for (insert console name)? Can you bring any snacks (optional)? Pick one console. And rent games from Gamefly or other places like that (you can buy games, too, if you want). Set the console up in a big room with lots of furniture and tables.  Get snacks and soda for the party and clean all the dishes. You never know how many dishes you'll use. Set up the party. Put the snacks on the tables, pour one cup of soda for every friend, plug up the controllers and pick out the games for the night. Have fun. Don't freak out after losing a game, or be cocky. By doing that, you ruin the party.
